DataElement.preferredName: Patient Laboratory Procedure Prior Randomization Eligibility Determination Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to patient's criteria to determine eligibility based on laboratory procedures prior to randomization.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Laboratory Procedure Prior Randomization Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's criteria to determine eligibility based on laboratory procedures prior to randomization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Prior Randomization Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:Earlier in time or order.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Laboratory values obtained <=
ReferenceDocuments.description: Laboratory values obtained <= 14 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRFText3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Laboratory values obtained <= 28 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were hematology and biochemistry done within 7 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <=14 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must have normal organ and marrow function within 14 days prior to the start of treatment. The following laboratory values obtained <= 14 days prior start of treatment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must have normal organ and marrow function as defined below with screening labs being drawn within 14 days of treatment initiation

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must have normal organ and marrow function as defined below with screening labs being drawn within 14 days of initiation of retreatment
